description:
Boost your creativity! üôå

Be on the same page with your team through Whiteboard.

‚óè Changes you make are broadcasted to other participants within a few seconds.
‚óè  Create as many boards as you need.
‚óè Share with anyone! Invite your team mates or friends to your boards to share ideas.
name: Whiteboard API - Visual Collaboration
plugin_instructions:
1- Draw "Whiteboard" element into your page

2- Fill necessary fields

3- Enter your API Key from the "Whiteboard" plugin in the "Plugins" tab

That's all!

- The minimum width of the whiteboard element should be 800px for it to work properly.

Note: You can find your keys from here: https://www.whiteboard.team/app/panel/developers
(You can pass client secret in Api-Key)
